name: Gildan Activewear Inc
title: BRIEF-Gildan Activewear to acquire Alstyle Apparel at $110 million

content: Feb 17 Kraft Foods Group Inc named James Kehoe  the chief financial officer of Canadian apparel maker Gildan Activewear Inc  as its CFO as part of a management shakeup under new Chief Executive John Cahill.
name: Gildan Activewear Inc
title: UPDATE 2-Kraft Foods brings back company veteran as CFO

content: Feb 17 Kraft Foods Group Inc said it hired James Kehoe  the chief financial officer of Canadian apparel maker Gildan Activewear Inc  as its CFO to succeed Teri List-Stoll  who will step down on Feb. 28 after a leadership shakeup.
name: Gildan Activewear Inc
title: Kraft Foods hires James Kehoe from Gildan Activewear to be CFO
